title: Ep. 796 - Pay No Attention To The Man Behind The Curtain
description:
A ballot box issue throws NYC’s mayoral race into chaos, the NSA issues a non-denial denial that it’s spying on Tucker, and Nike’s CEO describes his company as a brand “of China and for China.”
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
